OOC: Heh, you know, I had a bot like that first, his name is Clash. Big
Dragon Ball Z fan I am, but I didn't let Clash get too carried away, he's
still a normal bot like any of the rest, if you want to count him as NORMAL,
even...

----- Original Message -----
From: <kinger01030@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, January 01, 2001 12:42 AM
Subject: Stage one (finished)


> The masqutio bots  arrived at the hole. The lizard crawled from his cavern
> and watched as the bots retrned. Drill bit, apocalypse, hell beast,
cerberus,
> killfest,  zardus.... all supplied dna to begin his perfect body. The bots
> entered him. The lizard glowed. It grew into a cacoon. It hovered in the
air.
> The glow was so bright it could be seen from miles around. All it needed
was
> that burst of energy it needed to finish the transformation. Clouds
covered
> the area. The glow of the egg grew brighter drawing the storm. A bolt of
> lighting shot the egg. It craked. Out came a bot long since forgotten. His
> robot mode finished. He had the hard shelled armor of zardus. The eyes of
> Killfest. He had cerberus's tatical ability's in his head. He had
> apocalypse's dragon mode. And he had Drill bit's drill mode. He had hell
> beast's evil desire for death and destruction. (like he needs more.)  He
had
> no expression on his face. His desire to become his perfect form was
drawing
> him on now. He had his list that he needed to finish. He locked on his
first
> target. He wanted his ultimate beast mode form. And his assasin skills to
be
> fully restored and to do so his first two victims where perfect for it. He
> must absorb them. he took off. His speed made a deep gash it the ground as
he
> flew.
>
>
